segments.text: The cookie jar is almost within the boy's reach, but he's really stretching for it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the determination on his face, he really wants those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is waiting patiently, hoping he'll share with her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit tense watching him balance on that stool, it looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he gets the cookies without falling, that would be a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The jar is filled with cookies, it must be so tempting for them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've been told not to take cookies without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's focus is entirely on the jar, nothing else seems to matter to him right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit funny how much effort he's putting into getting those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost taste the cookies just by looking at them, they look delicious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they enjoy their treat, they seem to be working hard for it.
segments.speaker: PAR
